title: Number of Sets of K Non-Overlapping Line Segments
content:
Given  points on a 1-D plane, where the  point (from 0 to ) is at , find the number of ways we can draw exactly  non-overlapping line segments such that each segment covers two or more points. The endpoints of each segment must have integral coordinates. The  line segments do not have to cover all  points, and they are allowed to share endpoints.
Return the number of ways we can draw  non-overlapping line segments. Since this number can be huge, return it modulo .
